info.title: Colloquy API Documentation
info.description: This is the REST API for Colloquy web app.

patch.description: Reset password of a registered user.

get.description: Get activity stats of the currently logged-in user.

post.description: Change login password of currently logged-in user.

patch.description: Add a new user display picture.

get.description: Get all posts created by a user.

get.description:
